column4: Fitch: China's JD.com Has High Yield Credit Profile
column5: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) HONG KONG/SINGAPORE  April 25 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings says that China's largest  direct sales online retailer by revenue  JD.com  Inc. (JD) does not have an  investment-grade credit profile due to its low profits and weak cash generation.  In addition  Fitch believes that JD's internet financing business is an integral  part of its retail operations and thus  the company needs to be analysed on a  consolidated basis.
